attributes.action: Disclose any impact assessment for a Post Referendum exit strategy.
attributes.additional_details: The Government have compromised the erstwhile impartial Civil Service and made them partial on this issue. It is time for the fair minded public to tell the Government their displeasure at this development.
attributes.background:
Following The Prime Minister announcing the Referendum on UK membership of the political European Union the Government must have an impact assessment for either result. 

There has to be an exit strategy developed. The public need that information to make an informed decision on their vote.
